synopsis.text: Kazuya and Kiriha return in this OVA, featuring six captivating side stories that complement the main series, "Tsugumomo." From the daily challenges of getting to school on time and sharing a bath, to the unexpected discovery of Kazuya's secret magazine collection, each tale offers a delightful twist on their unique relationship. In one story, Kazuya struggles with the aftermath of his battle against Sunao, only to realize that seeking help from Kiriha might lead to more chaos. Meanwhile, Sunao and her Tsugumomo, Kotetsu, reflect on their shared past, revealing the intricate bond between them. This OVA, financed through crowdfunding and released with the special edition of the 24th manga volume, promises laughter, excitement, and a deeper look into the lives of your favorite characters.
